comments.text:
Created attachment 503590
Netscape Navigator Rebrand

See attached screen shot.

In the context of this sentence:

"Firefox is designed by Mozilla, a global community working together to make the Internet better."

It doesn't make sense to replace Firefox and/or Mozilla with their brandShortName and vendorShortName equivalents from branding.

See attached screenshot to understand why.

The sentence should read the same, regardless of the branding.

Incidentally, where does this statement come from? I couldn't find it in the source code.
